sourceMeaningMnemonic: What does your <radical>mama</radical> tell you to do in the <radical>street</radical>? Look before you cross! You gotta do it <kanji>beforehand</kanji>, or it could be too late.
meaningInfo: Imagine yourself about to cross the street, and your mama saying in your ear: "always look beforehand"!
readingMnemonic: As you look <kanji>beforehand</kanji>, you see a <reading>yo-</reading>yo (<ja>よ</ja>) lying in the street.
readingInfo: As you cross the road, you pick up the yo-yo and put it in your pocket. You're really glad you looked beforehand, because you now have a yo-yo!
